pr_title: EQL: Fix custom scripting for functions

timeline.message:
EQL: Fix custom scripting for functions

Improve separation of scripting between EQL and SQL by delegating common
methods to QL. The context detection is determined based on the package
to avoid having repetitive class hierarchies.

Relates #53688

Remove common string with constant reference
Better isolation of Painless whitelists
Fix incorrect sql

timeline.bodyText: these should be moved to test_queries_supported.toml if they are working now
timeline.author: rw-access
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -881,34 +881,6 @@ file where opcode=0 and indexOf(file_name, 'explorer.', 0) == 0'''
 expected_event_ids  = [88, 92]
 description = "check substring ranges"
 
-[[queries]]

replies.bodyText: they should be already there, test_queries_unsupported.toml file is more like a blacklist for test harness
replies.author: aleksmaus
